mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tingBoard(boardIdx, title, clientIdx, content, originalcontent, tag, fname, fsize, regdate) VALUES(tingBoard_seq.nextval,#{title},#{clientIdx},#{content},#{originalContent},#{tag},#{fname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fsize, jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE tingBoard SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, ORIGINALCONTENT = #{originalContent}, TAG = #{tag}, FNAME = #{fname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSIZE = #{fsize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE boardIdx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT boardIdx,title,clientIdx,regdate,fname,fsize FROM tingBoard ORDER BY boardIdx desc
